reviews.text: YENİ KURULUM YAPTIRDIM BEİN CONNET UYGULAMASINI MAALESEF İNDİREMİYORSUNUZ. GÜNCELLEME GELECEK AMA NE ZAMAN GELECEK BELLİ DEĞİLMİŞ. KUMANDA DA TOD TV KISAYAYOLU KOYMUŞLAR AMA ONUDA KULLANAMIYORSUNUZ BÖLGENİZDE KULLANIMA UYGUN DEĞİL DİYOR :) LG MARKASINA GÜVENEREK ALDIM.. LG YERİNE FARKLI BİR MARKA ALMIŞ OLSAYDIM ŞU ANDA TV İZLİYOR OLABİLECEKTİM.
reviews.author: LG

reviews.text: ekran yansıtma özelliğini kullandığınız zaman sürekli donma oluyorwifi bağlantısında sürekli kopma oluyor tekrardan ayarlardan wifi ye girip yeniden bağlantı yapmanız gerekiyorweb tarayıcı özelliği tamamen çöp aşırı donuyor ve çoğu siteyi desteklemiyor
reviews.author: LG

reviews.text: ÇOK KALİTELİ VE MÜKEMMEL ÖTESİ BİR TELEVİZYON. SEYİR KALİTESİ ANLATILMAZ YAŞANIR
reviews.author: LG

reviews.text: 10haziran 2023 de forum Ankara Teknosa tavsiyesi ile sipariş verdim ürün mükemmel görüntü ve özellik içeriyor tavsiyelerim kumandasını çocuklar mikrofon yerine kullanmaya başldılar :)
reviews.author: LG

reviews.text: Ürün yeterli seviyede.
reviews.author: Google Customer Reviews

reviews.text: We purchased this TV for our Christmas present to ourselves. While it was fairly easy to assemble and set up, I did find that the TV was fairly complicated to use, with a lot of functions that I still do not use or understand. I also found that it didn't have the accessory connections that I needed for our VHS tape playor or DVD player, so cannot use them now at all. I also cannot set up our sound system that we had from our previous TV since there is no sound output and the LG sound system costs more than the TV did, so that's out of our range.We are still working on understanding how to use the TV and it's many function and station apps. With all of the setups and user guide information on the TV and not a booklet, and us being an older generation, we are struggling to use many of the functions, and even setups. We still have to use 2 remotes, since we have Dish Satellite system, which will shut down after a couple of hours of inactivity, and it will not start up without using the remote for Dish. It's also harder to change channels, look at the guide, etc., for Dish using the LG remote. So that being said, it's not all that we hoped that it would be.The picture quality and overall TV system is quite nice compared to our older TV, but not having our sound bar for a quality sound, not having hookups for our DVD and VHS systems, it is not as useful as our older TV.We still really like the TV itself and the quality though. The price was decent as well. Only time will tell if we will purchase another LG after this one. Daha az
reviews.author: LG

reviews.text: The TV has many customisable features for avid gamers and recreational techies like myself! I love the fact that you can have independent settings like Game Optimiser mode for only when your gaming console is turned on and Auto Power Save + AI Sound Pro for Live TV Programmes like watching the ATP circuit. Also, if you're using the Smart features to stream or connect your Smart Assistants considerIf you have a gaming console though and want to take full advantage of HDR, be sure to completely turn off your console and TV's ALLM settings so that low latency isn't constantly shifting the colour depth. In addition, change your console's 4K output to -1/-2 instead of Auto, otherwise there will be constant flickering every couple of seconds, which can really throw a monkey wrench into your gaming experience! Otherwise, this is the first major TV purchase that I've made in years and I'm very happy with it so far. It especially looks good when wall mounted, which I opted for as the inherent anti-glare feature was another selling point for me picking this brand and model.Only reason that I didn't give a full 5 stars is because of the terrible energy efficiency rating but the energy saving features in settings kinda save it from being a liability on utilities. Daha az
reviews.author: johnlewis.com

reviews.text: Estoy muy contento con el televisor en general, por el precio y mis necesidades la calidad es bastante bien. Si normalmente ves la tele a un ángulo que no es directamente enfrente del televisor puede ser pues pierde un poco la calidad de este punto de vista (pero se ve algo)Hay suficiente opciones para cambiar la imagen a tu gusto, de momento estoy usando el modo experto (dark)La única cosa que no me gusta es el sistema operativo de LG (WebOS 23). Va todo muy lento, incluso cambiando de canales. También me molesta un poco que no hay un botón en el mando para elegir subtítulos/audio/info y tienes que ir a los menús para cambiar algo, algo que yo hago con frecuencia porque soy inglés y generalmwnte prefiero ver la version original con subtitulos en español. Solo por WebOS creo que no compraré una tele de LG en el futuro. Dudo que las actualizaciones (si las harán) vayan a ayudar mucho porque leo que la version anterior fue mal también. Pero tal vez es algo que todos los "Smart TVs" tienen en común. Daha az
reviews.author: mediamarkt.es

reviews.text: This was a birthday gift from our kids to my wife for her birthday. We're both together in assisted living, & the idea was for a TV that was easier for her to see as she's 75%-ish bedfast due to a stroke. The pros are that the picture is fantastic. It's mounted to the wall with the provided mount that swivels out. She's unable to use any remote, & we're presently using Fire TV, & I have to find programs for her & not take advantage of LG's features because:The major con of this TV is the remote. The cursor frantically jumps around, & though after some fiddling I could finally get the TV to Amazon, & the interesting thing is that the Fire TV remote operates properly. I did contact customer support about the LG remote problem, & I was told I could adjust the cursor speed, & if that didn't work, then but their "standard" remote. Thing is, without a bunch of detail, as long as I don't turn the TV off & stay on Fire TV, all's well. Otherwise, the cursor is just way too jumpy for me to want to waste time messing with it when I should be working. Daha az
reviews.author: LG

reviews.text: Ese televisor es una joya tecnológica que ofrece una experiencia visual sorprendente y funciones inteligentes de vanguardia. Combina un tamaño generoso de pantalla con una IA avanzada para brindar una experiencia de visualización inigualable.La calidad de imagen de este televisor es simplemente impresionante. La pantalla de 65 pulgadas y una resolución nítida, los colores se ven vibrantes y realistas y te sumergen por completo en tus películas, programas y juegos favoritos. La tecnología de mejora de imagen basada en IA optimiza automáticamente la calidad de la imagen para ofrecerte una experiencia visual increíblemente inmersiva.Lo que realmente distingue a este televisor es su inteligencia artificial integrada. Con la IA de LG, puedes acceder a una amplia gama de funciones inteligentes que simplifican tu experiencia de entretenimiento. El asistente de voz integrado permite controlar el televisor con comandos de voz simples, lo que facilita el cambio de canales, el ajuste del volumen y la búsqueda de contenido. Además, la IA aprende tus preferencias y te recomienda contenido personalizado, lo que te permite descubrir nuevas películas, programas y aplicaciones adaptados a tus gustos. Daha az
reviews.author: mediamarkt.es
